verses.text:
And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* him out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of all his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*:
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and my \w fortress|strong="H4686"\w*, and my \w deliverer|strong="H6403"\w*;

The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*; in him will I \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*: \add he is\add* my \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*, and the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, my high \w tower|strong="H4869"\w*, and my \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w*, my \w saviour|strong="H3467"\w*; thou \w savest|strong="H3467"\w* me from \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*.

I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* on the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add who is\add* worthy to be \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*: so shall I be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* from mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

When the \w waves|strong="H4867"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w compassed|strong="H0661"\w* me, the \w floods|strong="H5158"\w* of ungodly \w men|strong="H1100"\w* made me \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*;\f + \fr 22.5 \ft waves: or, pangs\f*\f + \fr 22.5 \ft ungodly…: Heb. Belial\f*

The \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* of \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* compassed me \w about|strong="H5437"\w*; the \w snares|strong="H4170"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w prevented|strong="H6923"\w* me;\f + \fr 22.6 \ft sorrows: or, cords\f*

In my \w distress|strong="H6862"\w* I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* to my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and he did \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* out of his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, and my \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* \add did enter\add* into his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

Then the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shook|strong="H1607"\w* and \w trembled|strong="H7493"\w*; the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w moved|strong="H7264"\w* and \w shook|strong="H1607"\w*, because he was \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*.

There went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* a \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* out of his \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*: \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* were \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w* by it.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft out of his nostrils: Heb. by, etc\f*
He \w bowed|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* also, and came \w down|strong="H3381"\w*; and \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* \add was\add* under his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

And he \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* upon a \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, and did \w fly|strong="H5774"\w*: and he was \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* upon the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H7896"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w pavilions|strong="H5521"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him, \w dark|strong="H2841"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \add and\add* thick \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* of the \w skies|strong="H7834"\w*.\f + \fr 22.12 \ft dark…: Heb. binding of waters\f*
Through the \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* before him were \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w thundered|strong="H7481"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w* \w uttered|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.
And he sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, and \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* them; \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*, and \w discomfited|strong="H2000"\w* them.

And the \w channels|strong="H0650"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w*, the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* were \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, at the \w rebuking|strong="H1606"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, at the \w blast|strong="H5397"\w* of the \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* of his \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*.

He \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* from \w above|strong="H4791"\w*, he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* me; he \w drew|strong="H4871"\w* me out of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*;\f + \fr 22.17 \ft many: or, great\f*

He \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me from my \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \add and\add* from them that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* me: for they were too \w strong|strong="H0553"\w* for me.
They \w prevented|strong="H6923"\w* me in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was my \w stay|strong="H4937"\w*.
He brought me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* also into a large \w place|strong="H4800"\w*: he \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w* me, because he \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* in me.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* me according to my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*: according to the \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* hath he \w recompensed|strong="H7725"\w* me.
For I have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and have not wickedly \w departed|strong="H7561"\w* from my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
For all his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add were\add* before me: and \add as for\add* his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, I did not \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from them.
I was also \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* before him, and have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* myself from mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 22.24 \ft before: Heb. to\f*

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w recompensed|strong="H7725"\w* me according to my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; according to my \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* in his eye \w sight|strong="H5048"\w*.\f + \fr 22.25 \ft in…: Heb. before his eyes\f*

With the \w merciful|strong="H2623"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w merciful|strong="H2616"\w*, \add and\add* with the \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w upright|strong="H8552"\w*.

With the \w pure|strong="H1305"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w pure|strong="H1305"\w*; and with the \w froward|strong="H6141"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w unsavoury|strong="H6617"\w*.\f + \fr 22.27 \ft shew thyself unsavoury: or, wrestle\f*

And the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* thou wilt \w save|strong="H3467"\w*: but thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add are\add* upon the \w haughty|strong="H7311"\w*, \add that\add* thou mayest bring \add them\add* \w down|strong="H8213"\w*.

For thou \add art\add* my \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w lighten|strong="H5050"\w* my \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.  +  r 22.29  t lamp: or, candle *

For by thee I have \w run|strong="H7323"\w* through a \w troop|strong="H1416"\w*: by my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* have I leaped \w over|strong="H1801"\w* a \w wall|strong="H7791"\w*.\f + \fr 22.30 \ft run: or, broken\f*

\add As for\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add is\add* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*; the \w word|strong="H0565"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w tried|strong="H6884"\w*: he \add is\add* a \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* to all them that \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in him.\f + \fr 22.31 \ft tried: or, refined\f*

For who \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w save|strong="H1107"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? and who \add is\add* a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w save|strong="H1107"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* \add and\add* \w power|strong="H2428"\w*: and he \w maketh|strong="H5425"\w* my \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*.\f + \fr 22.33 \ft maketh: Heb. riddeth, or, looseth\f*

He \w maketh|strong="H7737"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w like|strong="H7737"\w* \w hinds’|strong="H0355"\w* \add feet:\add* and \w setteth|strong="H5975"\w* me upon my high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.\f + \fr 22.34 \ft maketh: Heb. equalleth\f*

He \w teacheth|strong="H3925"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*; so that a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* of \w steel|strong="H5154"\w* is \w broken|strong="H5181"\w* by mine \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*.\f + \fr 22.35 \ft to war: Heb. for the war\f*

Thou hast also \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* of thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*: and thy \w gentleness|strong="H6031"\w* hath made me \w great|strong="H7235"\w*.\f + \fr 22.36 \ft made…: Heb. multiplied me\f*
Thou hast \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* my \w steps|strong="H6806"\w* under me; so that my \w feet|strong="H7166"\w* did not \w slip|strong="H4571"\w*.\f + \fr 22.37 \ft feet: Heb. ankles\f*

I have \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them; and turned not \w again|strong="H7725"\w* until I had \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them.

And I have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them, and \w wounded|strong="H4272"\w* them, that they could not \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*: yea, they are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* under my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

For thou hast \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* me with \w strength|strong="H2428"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: them that rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me hast thou \w subdued|strong="H3766"\w* under me.\f + \fr 22.40 \ft subdued: Heb. caused to bow\f*
Thou hast also \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me the \w necks|strong="H6203"\w* of mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, that I might \w destroy|strong="H6789"\w* them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me.

They \w looked|strong="H8159"\w*, but \add there was\add* none to \w save|strong="H3467"\w*; \add even\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* them not.

Then did I \w beat|strong="H7833"\w* them as small as the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, I did \w stamp|strong="H1854"\w* them as the \w mire|strong="H2916"\w* of the \w street|strong="H2351"\w*, \add and\add* did spread them \w abroad|strong="H7554"\w*.

Thou also hast \w delivered|strong="H6403"\w* me from the \w strivings|strong="H7379"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, thou hast \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* me \add to be\add* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*: a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add which\add* I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.

\w Strangers|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w submit|strong="H3584"\w* themselves unto me: as soon as they \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, they shall be \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w* unto me.\f + \fr 22.45 \ft Strangers: Heb. Sons of the stranger\f*\f + \fr 22.45 \ft submit…: or, yield feigned obedience: Heb. lie\f*
\w Strangers|strong="H1121"\w* shall fade \w away|strong="H5034"\w*, and they shall be \w afraid|strong="H2296"\w* out of their close \w places|strong="H4526"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*; and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* my \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*; and \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* be the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

It \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w avengeth|strong="H5414"\w* me, and that bringeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* under me,\f + \fr 22.48 \ft avengeth: Heb. giveth avengement for\f*

And that bringeth me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: thou also hast lifted me up on \w high|strong="H7311"\w* above them that rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me: thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me from the \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

Therefore I will give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and I will sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\add He is\add* the \w tower|strong="H4024"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* for his \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: and \w sheweth|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* to his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*, unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and to his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
